text: Hurwitz's theorem can refer to several theorems named after Adolf Hurwitz: * Hurwitz's theorem (complex analysis) * Riemann–Hurwitz formula in algebraic geometry * Hurwitz's theorem (composition algebras) on quadratic forms and nonassociative algebras * Hurwitz's automorphisms theorem on Riemann surfaces * Hurwitz's theorem (number theory)
title: Hurwitz's theorem
